thread.title: Chelsea transfer news: Alvaro Morata boasting Lionel Messi-esque stats | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea transfer news: Alvaro Morata boasting Lionel Messi-esque stats | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea transfer news: Alvaro Morata boasting Lionel Messi-esque stats | Metro News
text:
Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 28 Feb 2017 8:33 am Alvaro Morata is having an impressive season (Picture: Getty) 
Chelsea have been repeatedly linked with a transfer move for Alvaro Morata in recent months, but the bad news for them is he’s really starting to make an impact for Real Madrid. 
The Spain international was a surprise signing at the Bernabeu last summer, with Real exercising a buy-back clause to bring him back from Juventus despite no obvious role for him in Zinedine Zidane’s first XI. Jamie Carragher launches scathing attack on Leicester players after Liverpool win 
Morata’s goal record in Serie A was not exactly mind-blowing, with just 15 strikes in 63 league appearances for Juve, but he’s looking far more prolific this season. 
Despite not initially being a regular for Los Blancos, Morata has already notched up 12 goals for the season, equalling his tally for the entirety of 2015/16 in far fewer minutes. Real Madrid top scorers (all comps) Cristiano Ronaldo
